did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Accounts, balance sheets, and correspondence with stockholders and others relating to the question of disposal of plant and stocks after passage of the Volstead Act, to the sale of votes against the company, a resulting legal judgment, the seizure of a truckload of champagne, a sheriff's sale of the property, and a susequent suit by the federal government.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Accounts, balance sheets, and correspondence with stockholders and others relating to the question of disposal of plant and stocks after passage of the Volstead Act, to the sale of votes against the company, a resulting legal judgment, the seizure of a truckload of champagne, a sheriff's sale of the property, and a susequent suit by the federal government.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Prohibition--New York (State)--Hammondsport.
Wine and wine making --Law and legislation.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Hammondsport Wine Company Records, #488. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
